page.title: 14SHOPPING FACILITIES, SEAFORD
page.content: THE SHOPPING FACILITIES IN SEAFORD ARE RATHER BASIC AND HAVE NOT KEPT UP WITH THE GROWING POPULATION. AT LONG LAST A{BIG SUPERMARKET}IS PLANNED AND SHOULD BE BUILT BY EARLY{1986. IN SEAFORD WE COULD DO WITH A FEW TOYSHOPS AND SOME BIGGER AND BETTER SUPERMARKETS. MANY PEOPLE WOULD APPROVE IF THE BANKS WERE OPEN ON SATURDAYS. IT SEEMS THERE ARE FAR TOO MANY{BUILDING SOCIETIES}AND {ESTATE AGENTS}IN THE SHOPPING AREA. WE COULD DO WITH SOME BETTER SWEETSHOPS EVEN THOUGH WE HAVE QUITE A FEW ALREADY. NOT MANY PEOPLE BUY CLOTHES IN SEAFORD, BUT MOSTLY IN BRIGHTON OR EASTBOURNE.{A PEDESTRIAN SHOPPING {PLACE}WOULD BE POPULAR WITH SOME. THERE ARE{SMALL PARADES OF SHOPS IN {SOME RESIDENTIAL AREAS}WHICH ARE PARTICULARLY USEFUL TO THE LARGE NUMBER OF ELDERLY PEOPLE.
